nodes.text: Docking Bay 112 was a docking bay that was situated in the Grand Terminal, a spaceport located in Junction City on the planet Feriae Junction. At some point between 1000 BBY and 0 BBY, a Human bagman working for the shipping magnate Brevis Taug and a group of spacers that were tracking the bagman's movements boarded a starship in Docking Bay 112, which was due to travel to the space station Bazarre via the planets Corellia and Kalarba.
